name: Betrayed Alliance: Book 1
storyline:
You've been set up! Princess Julyn has gone missing on the eve of her marriage to a foreign prince as part of a peace treaty. War now looms on the horizon as tensions increase and you, the Princess's previous fiancee and general of the army are suspect number one.

After being jailed, you've been rescued by a wizard and he a task for you. Find Princess Julyn and bring her back to safety.
summary: A Sierra-style EGA parser adventure game. The first Book in a planned Trilogy of fantasy adventure games.

videos.name: Trailer
